title: Lindsay Peoples Wagner
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with Lindsay Peoples Wagner, the Editor in Chief of New York Magazine's The Cut. They discuss her journey to becoming the youngest editor in chief of any Conde Nast magazine, pop culture, and the fashion industry's struggle with inclusivity. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
